bridge-type.label: Gira One Server
bridge-type.description: The Gateway to your Gira One Smart-Home installation.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Gira One Server's Hostname or IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of GiraOne Server

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username to access the Gira One Server

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to access the Gira One Server

parameter.name: tryReconnectAfterSeconds
parameter.label: Try Reconnect After
parameter.description: How many seconds should be waited before trying a reconnect on as serverside closed connection (e.g. reboot)

parameter.name: defaultTimeoutSeconds
parameter.label: Default Timeout
parameter.description: How long should be waited on any answer before failing?

parameter.name: sessionTimeToLive
parameter.label: Session Time to Live
parameter.description: How long should the session to Gira One Server should be kept before reconnect

parameter.name: maxTextMessageSize
parameter.label: Maximum number of kBytes to accept from Gira One Server as single message.
parameter.description: Increase this value for large GiraOne Project installations.

parameter.name: discoverDevices
parameter.label: Discover Gira One Devices
parameter.description: Should the Bridge Auto Discover Devices and attach them to the Inbox.

parameter.name: discoverButtons
parameter.label: Discover Gira One Buttons/Trigger
parameter.description: Should the Bridge Auto Discover KnxButtons and attach them to the Inbox.

parameter.name: buttonReleaseTimeout
parameter.label: Button RELEASED Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in ms, a Pressed Button Switches back the Released.

parameter.name: overrideWithProjectSettings
parameter.label: Allow to override manual config by Project
parameter.description: Allows to override manual configured settings for Label or Location by values from Project
